ITS ANMAZING!!! the quality on the picturesis absolutely amazing. the pictures look lifelike. not to mention the camera has a great fell to it and it looks really nice. not too mention its myriad of features. its smile shutter works absolutely amazingly. it always gets a great smile. this is the best camera i have ever seen. i have had it for nearly a year and im still in love with. even compared to other cameras i see people use... these pictures come out so much better. you must get this camera.

Reviews.Title: Pictures are GREAT! Not meant for moving pics tho
Reviews.Author: M. Pomeroy
Reviews.Content: I absolutely looove the pictures from this camera. Its sooo much better than my 5 MP that i had last time. It didnt click that when it said "Steady super shot" that it wasnt meant for spoting events or what not. Nonetheless it was worth the money compared to the deal and a major upgrade to what i had last time

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: L. Hoberman
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter's 25th birthday. She wanted a 10 megapixel, 5x zoom camera. She said it takes great pictures and is very happy with it. I have an older Sony for the last three years and am very happy with it as well. Amazon offered the best price around and free shipping. I have bought a few items from Amazon and have never been disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Roseanne M. Cavanagh "gift giver"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my granddaughter's 19th birthday and she loves it.  She was also very happy that it is compatible with her laptop, which she had thought it would not be.  It's a perfect size and takes great pictures.  She loves all the features it has, especially the "smile face"!!

Reviews.Title: SONY DSCW 170
Reviews.Author: Praveen K. Dasari
Reviews.Content: This camera is great. I had used a Sony T300 but I somehow liked this one better. Its not exactly compact but not too big either. Image stabilition is good and picture clarity is really good. I have had no problems with it so far. Infact, I like the videos in this one better than my Canon HG20 camcorder. After using this I just returned my Canon HG20 and am looking to buy a Sony SR 11..If you are ok about the size..this is a good buy. The only thing I wouldlike in this is the zoom feature for video.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Jill A. Santos "JAGS"
Reviews.Content: I've had my Sony camera now for a little over a week, and I love it!  It has so many features, and the compact size is great.  I especially like the in-camera retouching.  You don't even have to crop your pictures on the computer, you can do it right on the camera before you upload them or print them.  The only feature I wish this camera offered is, to be able to take black and white pics.  Other than that, I am very pleased with my purchase and recommend it to everyone.  The shipping was also excellent - fast!

Reviews.Title: Best Camera On The market Today For The Price
Reviews.Author: David S. Bernstein "Sosec"
Reviews.Content: This Camera Was Well Planed When They Designed It. There Are Way Too Many Features To List. You Can Take Pictures From Low Res All The Way Up To 16:9 Wide Screen capability And Huge Size Files and Ultra high resolution. Get The 8 Gig Mark II Chip And You can Get Almost 4000 Picture @ Over 3 Meg A Piece. The Quality Of The Pictures And The Size of The Camera Will Astound You And It fits In The Palm Of Your Hand. The Stibility Control Can Take A Picture Even If You Have A Condition That Wont Allow You Hands From Shaking. Also The Camera Has 10.1 Mega Pixels. Great Product At A Great Price What More Can I Say!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Greatest Camera!
Reviews.Author: Laura Peynado
Reviews.Content: I owned an Olympus Stylus 710 or something like that and it took horrible pictures! I sold it and started comparing Sony cameras.. I finally chose this one and am glad I did! It takes GREAT photos in every kind of lighting and the Smile Shutter is great...GREAT CAMERA for a GREAT PRICE!5 stars!

Reviews.Title: Pleased-very nice camera
Reviews.Author: RBM "Sevenoaks"
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research and settled on the Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W170 based on its very positive 4-1/2 star reviews and the fact that it has a Zeiss lens. The lens was an important issue for me.My prime DSLR is a Pentax K-10D but I wanted a reasonably priced carry-every-day pocket camera. So far, this has exceeded my expectations.The controls almost go to infinity and yet you can choose EASY shooting mode for the quick photos. The LCD screen is clear and easily viewed.This is a very solid, well designed and easy to manipulate camera with exceptional fit and finish.You will need to purchase a Memory Stick Duo Adaptor for the Sony 170 but everything else is included. Even though this is a first blush review everything works perfect, pictures are very crisp and sharp. Time will tell as is true in anything but I would not hesitate to recommend this camera to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot 170 camera
Reviews.Author: Marie E. Sonnenberg
Reviews.Content: I had a older model of this camera and was very happy with it. I wanted to update and I got this one again and I am very happy with how it works. Very easy to learn.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot DSCW170R
Reviews.Author: Orlando A. Corpuz
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing!! takes excellent pix close and far.  Reading the manual is very helpful and I am still learning all the ins and outs of the camera.  One observation is that my kids keeps insisting that the color red is not really red but a bit on the pinkish side.  Overall, would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a stylish camera!

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Karen P. Fletcher "seminolewind"
Reviews.Content: Nice clear pictures, easy to use and carry.  Ready for use quickly.  The 5 stars is in comparison to same spec cameras of different brands.  I'm a photography buff and I do not put up with mediocre pictures.  I will keep this one .

Reviews.Title: Nice camera...
Reviews.Author: K. Hincher "Khincher"
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice camera, takes amazing pictures, the only thing is the battery really doesn't stay charged long at all. Other than that, its overall a good camera!

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: BRITT SMALL
Reviews.Content: This Sony camera is a great piece of photographic technology, shooting 10 megapixils, with lots of adjustment possibilities.

Reviews.Title: Sweet Camera
Reviews.Author: James D.
Reviews.Content: I realy like this camera, it takes great quality photos for a great price. Everyother camera iv'e ever had use AA batteries, I really like that this one is rechargeable. I also like the smile shutter, I realy doubted it would work, but it amazingly does.

Reviews.Title: Sony cybershot camera
Reviews.Author: Busy Grandma
Reviews.Content: This camera is TERRIFIC!  It takes such clear pictures, you will not believe it.  Easy to use.....small to take with you.....a purchase that you won't regret.

Reviews.Title: Brilliant Camera for day to day use (non-professional)
Reviews.Author: Scott H. Hekman "SlowSand"
Reviews.Content: We got this camera on Christmas day and over the next week we took almost 400 pictures without breaking a sweat.  It's turn-on time and it's quick flash reload time are great.  We're pleased with this purchase for sure.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use, Excellent Pictures and a Great Value
Reviews.Author: sitobe_99
Reviews.Content: The Sony Cybershot DSCW170 is extremely easy to operate which is very nice for anyone intimidated by electronic buttons and dials. The large screen and graphics make viewing a real pleasure. The Super Steady Shot provides very clear pictures of fast moving grandchildren and the video's are perfect for those of us with short attention spans and not much patience for a long home video. The size and weight make it very easy to transport and be available for that instance when a quick shot is needed.I highly recommend this camera to anyone for travel and family occasions.

Reviews.Title: Spots before your eyes
Reviews.Author: Patricia Harrelson "Author of Between Two Women"
Reviews.Content: Everything about this camera was great EXCEPT the blue and white spots that kept showing up on pictures. Not all of the pictures, just some but enough to feel discouraged and disappointed. A web search indicated that the spots were probably caused by the flash bouncing off dust particles in the air. But, why we wondered, did that not happen with other digital cameras? A little more investigation suggested that in the Sony Cybershot, the short distance between the lens and the flash MIGHT be responsible. Not knowing for sure and unable to control dust and/or when the spots appeared, we decided to return the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Sarah M. Ransom "sarahmr929"
Reviews.Content: This camera is fantastic! It is very resilient. I got it wet while traveling and it was foggy for a half hour and then dried itself out. It also bounced around my purse for three weeks in Europe with no problem. It takes great pictures and works well at night. The zoom feature works very well and switching between the easy and auto feature is easy. I would recommend this camera to anyone looking for a light camera they can take anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Love my little Sony camera
Reviews.Author: Texas "Grandma"
Reviews.Content: Needed a pocket sized camera to have handy and capture the moments in everyday life.  The dsc-w170 is wonderful.  It has many functions, yet you can start taking great picture right out of the package.  We have the Sony Hybrid and love it but considered it too much for hauling around on trips and everyday stuff -- thus this Sony purchase.Also with a memory card it can dispaly thousands of pictures -- great brag book - can just do a slide show and share!!

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot
Reviews.Author: Chris L. Martin "Creations by Chris"
Reviews.Content: I love the camera. This is my third Sony and would never purchase another brand. They are easy to use and take amazing pictures. I have a custom bridal business and use the camera to keep a portfolio of my creations. It never disappoints.

Reviews.Title: OK but.........
Reviews.Author: William P. Sapienza "Bill Sapienza"
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd Cyber-Shot camera that I have purchased. It is a great little point and shoot. This model however seems to be much more sensitive then the 120 I previously owned. Many of my photos are blurred. I use this model exactly as I did for my 120 and the % of bluured shots is greatly increased on the 170. Seems a mono or Trip Pod will need to be my next purchase although that removes the convenience of ownin a point and shoot.So the camera and its features are ok but the Jury is still out.

Reviews.Title: Good beyond belief
Reviews.Author: Paul Bachorz "paulbach"
Reviews.Content: Full of fun features that are easy to use and fun to experiment with. For example, the automatic slide shows on a TV with music is a real eye popper. How can all of this fit in a camera so small?Lens quality is superb, but this is a Zeiss lens.The only drawback is having to use Sony's special chips. But I bought a couple of 2 GIG cards on super sale. And, the cost of digital storage is dropping faster than the Dow Jones.The perfect "tweener" camera. It is between the tiny full of compromises cameras and the bigger prosumer cameras. It does not do RAW but then it is a tweener.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot
Reviews.Author: Westie Mom
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my 21 year old daughter and she loves it.  The screen in the back is just the right size and so far no complaints!

Reviews.Title: Best Point & Shoot I've ever owned.
Reviews.Author: Jason Lander
Reviews.Content: I have owned several point and shoots over the last few years and have close to 20,000 pictures posted on Flickr from these cameras.  All of these cameras were Canon's.  While the picture quality of these cameras was decent to good the actual camera itself wouldn't hold up.  I was buying a new one every year because something would break or stop working.I went in search of a more durable camera and ended up with the Pentax Optio W60 because of its claims of durability.  It was a durable camera but took the worst pictures I've ever seen.  After playing with it for 2 days I sent it back.I did more research and narrowed it down to this Sony and some other Canon's.  I wanted to make a change for nothing more than to see if I could keep a camera longer than 1 year without it breaking.  Not only is this Sony durable and easy to use - the picture quality is incredible. The focus and the realistic colors are so amazing I want to go back and retake all of my pictures.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Jungle King
Reviews.Content: What a great purchase - I am very happy with this camera's capability & preformance.

Reviews.Title: Much improved Sony Cybershot
Reviews.Author: mamma loca
Reviews.Content: I already have a Sony Cybershot 5.1 mp- but I got the DSCW170 with 10.1 mp for Christmas. The last one took terrible low light photos, this is where Sony Cybershot is much improved. This camera takes great photos even in low light and I can even get clear photos of my daughter who never sits still. One downside the "red" color camera looks more a dark pink and not a full red.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: L. MATSUMOTO
Reviews.Content: I had a Sony T100 I purchased about two years ago. It was very difficult to navigate through the menus, etc. The photos never came out great. They always had a red/orange tint. So I decided to try this model even though it is somewhat of a downgrade in models. To my surprise this camera takes better pictures than the T100! Shots in low light come out great and of course day pics come out fabulous! Also, since the main functions and shooting selections are on the dial, it's much easier to navigate and find the settings you want. I'm still testing it out but so far I am quite pleased. One thing I do miss on the W170 that I had on the T100 is the sports shooting. I used it a lot shooting pics of football games. Can't understand why they didn't include this on the W170. That's the one reason I gave it four stars.Additional info after having camerca for a few weeks: So, I've had this camera for about a month now and had a chance to take pics during the Christmas and New Year's holidays. And I must say that I am quite pleased with how the photos came out. The colors were vibrant and very true to color. Using the various settings allowed me to set the camera for the right lighting situation, etc. I use Photoshop Elements to touch up photos but I haven't had to use it much with the W170.

Reviews.Title: Great camera !
Reviews.Author: einar
Reviews.Content: This camera is so easy to use !  Replaced my wife's older Nikon with one.  Takes great pictures, LCD screen easy to see, one of the few digital cameras left which has an optical viewfinder to use if light is too bright to see LCD.  Get a 4 gig memory stick & download to PC with supplied USB cable & software.  Smile recognition feature is great for taking pictures of our grandkids - shutter won't trip until a smile is seen !

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and works great
Reviews.Author: m.g.
Reviews.Content: Where I work, I'm able to play with a lot of cameras and see the good, bad, and ugly of each of them.  Slowly but surely, I started playing with the DSCW170 and DSCW150 (150 is almost exactly the same, except it's a 8.1mp camera) and learned to love them.Customers couldn't believe how fast I could take a photo of them and it almost always turned out looking good (98% of the time), and with a ton of features, easy to use dial that explain what each mode will do on screen, and a sleek design, this camera is an excellent bargain.One other thing, you can get it for $229.99 at Circuit City.

Reviews.Title: DSC-W170
Reviews.Author: Dev
Reviews.Content: I originally purchased this small camera as a replacement for my 10.1 mega pixel Casio Exlium. Although I thought the Casio was a good point and shoot, about 90% of the shots were flat, lifeless, and constantly "soft."I am able to spend a lot of time with various cameras where I work, and after playing with the Sony, I was amazed. Rich vibrant colors, sharp definition, and the the anti-shake, well, is hands down the best when compared to various Canon, Olympus, and Nikon models.Recently, I was on vacation with my girlfriend here in Colorado. Every day for a solid week, I took no less than 100-150 shots a day, mainly in the Easy, and landscape modes. Every thing from indoor shots, mountain shots, portraits, wildlife... Well, during that time frame, I charged it no more than twice, and have hundreds of cherished pictures from it.Hands down, the best small point and shoot on the market.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Baylan R. Hefferman "Reid Hefferman"
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use (I figured it out in about twenty minutes) and the picture quality is second to none. I am not going to waste anyone's time who decides to read this review. Short and sweet, I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone of my friends and/or family.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Camera

Reviews.Content: great images, battery last long, shoots in the dark w/o Flasher, big screen, after i bought it i just though that i would have got the Touch screen one, but its ok i can live with it.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with this camera.  I bought it for a trip to tour Louisianna plantations with my Mother and sister.  They both loved my camera as well.  It takes great photos 95% of the time.  The other 5% is me.  I'm still figuring out all of the abilities of the camera and getting it to do what I want it to do.  I am very happy with this purchase.  This is by far the best camera I have bought.

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Grace
Reviews.Content: DSCW170 is compact, lightweight, takes good pictures and is very easy to use.The price and Amazon's FREE shipping...wow  wonderful !!!!

Reviews.Title: Best Compact Camera I have owned !!!
Reviews.Author: Tom D "Navy Aviation Vet"
Reviews.Content: The "Super Steady Shot" is unbelievable. All the pictures I have taken have been blur free without using a tripod. Want a picture indoors without using flash to get that natural feeling this the camera is for you. Can't say enough about the auto focus. All the options you could think of. Amazon's FREE shipping arrived fast and packaged very well.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: N. DeFelice
Reviews.Content: Great little camera, but packs a big punch.  This camera has lots of features, but is consumer friendly.  This camera comes highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Good on some points.
Reviews.Author: S. Patlolla "reddynet"
Reviews.Content: Cons:1)Takes time focus on some modes.2)Complex Menus3)Taking pictures is Slow for some modes and Image processing takes quite time on easy mode.4) Auto focus doen't work well all times.Pro:1) Good Quality pictures, if you have patience.2) Manual adjustments, for your specialized needs.Overall its good camera, for point shoot.For beginners I suggest you to read and do some R&D; before accussing the camera.

Reviews.Title: Good deal on DSCW170
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: I was impressed how fast my camera had been delivered. I ordered it in the morning - between 4 and 5 am on Wednesday, and on Friday I had it delivered! Amazing! Camera works great. Well, Sony is trying to keep its brands up to the mark: no matter what products are. Excellent brand, nothing else to add.

Reviews.Title: Excellent point and shoot
Reviews.Author: packer42
Reviews.Content: I had the 7.2 MP cybershot and this is an excellent upgrade.  I am still able to use my base memory sticks and the quality of images have been great.

Reviews.Title: So easy to use
Reviews.Author: J. R. Masser "Crime Solver"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item for my boss.  He's technically challenged but this camera was so easy to use that he picked it up and started using it right away.  I absolutely recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Ramon David Sifuentes
Reviews.Content: The best camera I ever had. Better than my not-so-old Olympus Stylus 1200. Amazing underwater shoots...The correct Marine Pack for this camera is the Sony MPK-WD.

Reviews.Title: Great PHD Camera
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Janoski "Technical - but not an expert"
Reviews.Content: This is my second Push Here Dummy Sony Cybershot.  (The first one was three years old and ended up at the bottom of a lake -- it dried out over 3 days and still worked!)  Simpler to use interface than previous models, good technical improvements (steady shot), and more compact form factor.  Tested all cameras at local big box retailer, there is some good competition, but liked the interface (easy to use settings) and form factor of this one best.  I love the pictures it takes -- but I am not a pro, so I'll leave that rating to others.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Have had this camera for just a few days -- so no detailed comments, but it takes pretty good photos. Wanted to comment that the product info doesn't mention a charger and battery are included. I ordered those separately and have returned the charger but kept the battery -- an extra battery is a good idea -- the batteries for this camera don't last as long as others I've used. And many thanks to Amazon for the easy return options!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera!
Reviews.Author: P. Keyes
Reviews.Content: Got this a few weeks ago and have been busy trying out my new camera...it is fantastic, takes awesome pictures, is so easy to use, small enough to fit in a pocket or purse, batteries stay charged for a long time (something that was a big feature).  I love love love it!

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot
Reviews.Author: Y. Pabellon
Reviews.Content: Great item! It has great resolution and its also good to take pictures in motion. The shipping was faster than expected. The battery life is excellent!

Reviews.Title: Sounds good on paper but creates substandard Pictures,
Reviews.Author: Vivian T.
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera to replace an older Sony DSC-V1 5 MP. From the reviews and the specs it sounded like a great camera. Unfortunately, when we started using it, we were very disappointed. The camera itself is just the right size. Not too small but easily fits in a pocket. Feels solid. It's pretty easy to use and has a nice big LCD. Most of the pictures we took look good on the LCD screen however when we uploaded them to the computer, we noticed that only about 20% actually looked okay. The camera did well in bright lightning although even then it had a hard time focusing on even slow moving objects. However, in indoor shots even using the flash, the images would be grainy, details would be lost. The camera would have a hard time focusing. Tried the different settings on the camera without any improvement.When we then tested it against the five year old DSC-V1, the old camera with 1/2 the megapixel produced sharper pictures under the same conditions.So buyer beware. Our camera is heading back to Amazon. If you want to try this camera, buy it from a place that will let you return it if you are not satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Poor indoor pictures
Reviews.Author: C. Glasgow
Reviews.Content: I have owned this camera since July.  My pictures taken outside are good, but any pictures I take inside are terrible.Everything from them being very dark (even with the flash, and in a room with all the lamps on), to having them people look like they have jaundice!  I just downloaded all of my pictures from Christmas and out of 100 of them I would say that 10 are alright.After having an Olympus for 8 years, I thought I would get a new camera with more mega pixels.Plus, with a sony you have to use a "duo stick" memory card.  The types that is never on sale for a really good price.I would never buy a Sony camera again!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Nelson Andres Rosales
Reviews.Content: very nice camera.. i bought for my mom but im planing to buy one for me because i has a lot of features for the price.

Reviews.Title: camera ciber shot
Reviews.Author: Jaime Garcia "Apache"
Reviews.Content: Real good item. I've got what I wanted seeing the prop on TV. I've got pretty nice pictures from it, family, scenery, fun pictures whit the smile  gadget. I think I've got a real good price for it. Congratulations.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: M. Edwards
Reviews.Content: I bought this carmera with high expectation that the quality would be perfect since it is a 10.1 megapixcel carmera.  The photos are awful.  At nights even worst, you can never get a photo if it does not look as if it is in motion. Secondly it comes out really dark.  I reget the money I paid for this carmer.  i had an old hp carmer of 2.1 megapixcel and the quality of photos were alot better.  don't take your money and buy sony carmers. It is just not good

Reviews.Title: Great Features, Great Price, and Great Service. A triple play.
Reviews.Author: Woodard E. Copeland
Reviews.Content: Nothing better than a triple play. The seller got this camera to me ASAP. It has all the features, bells, & whistles I wanted. Had a really good price compared to the rest of the places I shopped. Was so good I bought this one for my wife and another for one of my daughters.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: E. M. Green
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! It's such great quality! I had recently bought this very camera, but in pink about a year ago. The reason I bought a new one was because of my own stupid actions. Long story, short I messed it up pretty badly. I'm not going to lie I can be VERY clutzy sometimes.I missed this camera so much so I bought it again. And I'm very happy with it. It takes beautiful pictures. You can visit my deviantart page to see. I take photos with it and they come out the best! I'll show you a link down later.And I love the fact that I can record videos! That's the only way I'd be able to upload my videos up to youtube! If you're curious about the quaility you can check out my channel too! XDMore of the recent ones are used with the awesome camera! :]Well, thank you so much Amazon for selling this camera. It's perfect for me! :D[...]

Reviews.Title: Amazing pics!!!
Reviews.Author: L. J. CHETTY "freespirit81"
Reviews.Content: I love, love, love this camera!!!Takes great pics even in low light! I actually read a bunch of reviews on this w/site before purchasing this camera and I see now that all the best reviews are true!! Only taking reg pics right now and I love it...can`t wait to use ALL the features when travelling!:)

Reviews.Title: Sony is sony...no more to say
Reviews.Author: Moyad F. Alrabadi
Reviews.Content: This is my second sony and you know what, after I gave my first one away I felt so bad so I started looking for another one And I saw the reviews for w170 and I bought it.The only thing I have to say is this camera is amazing. the only thing you need to get the maximmum of this camera is an 8 gig sdhc card.

Reviews.Title: BEST OF THE BEST
Reviews.Author: P. Garcia "HomeStudio"
Reviews.Content: This is an easy product to describe... for its price its easily one of the most powerful cameras i ever had. Pictures are colourful, sharp and definetively BIG, 10.1 MP is no joke!The Camera itself feels pretty solid and goodlooking, actually that was one of the main reasons that i bought it because i don't like how "Canon's" looks like no matter canons are great machines..to me is a perfect 10/10.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: J. Martin
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for all around use.  It takes very good pictures and its very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Gotta love the face detection feature
Reviews.Author: A. Hanson "ClubDubMama"
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera... I bought it because of the face detection feature.  The battery has a long life!

Reviews.Title: Good camera with one huge flaw
Reviews.Author: loafer
Reviews.Content: This camera takes decent pictures in a variety of situations, including low light.  In fact, it is the best of the four cameras that I have tried in low light situations without flash.  However, it has one flaw which caused me to return it in favor of a canon a2000, which is, while the lens is extended, the camera makes a continuous grinding noise, like a cheap plastic wheel spinning.  It is not loud and you have to put your head to the camera to hear it.  Big deal, right?  Here's the thing.  When you record video, the microphone picks this sound up.  Anything recorded indoors (or any situations without much background noise) will render a recording with this grinding noise in the background.  I don't want that in my family videos.  I thought it was a defective camera, so I exchanged it.  The second camera did the same thing.  I talked to sony support.  At first, they tried to deny it, then finally called it a "normal function" of the camera.  So, I returned it and bought a Canon A2000, which is bulkier, but has the same amount of mp and has a 6X optical zoom.  One more note, what's with the price fluxuation?  I bought it here (from Amazon, but other sellers were competitive) for $179.00 a month ago, and now the price is over a hundred dollars more???

Reviews.Title: I got a lemon.
Reviews.Author: J. Alexander
Reviews.Content: I got this as a Christmas gift for my wife.  After completely charging the battery it worked for about 2 pictures.  Then everytime I tried to take a photo the camera would flash and click but would power off.  No I did not accidentally hit the power button.

Reviews.Title: Awsome camera!

Reviews.Content: As many Sony products this camera is great! it has so many functions, it shows the pictures as slides with sound playing back. Best purchase!

Reviews.Content: I like sony cameras because of their quality products. The pictures are nice and camera is easy to handle. Sony rocks........

Reviews.Content: Sony has been around for a long time,and they have a great reputation,allmy stereo components are Sony.This Sony camera is compact,lightweight,and takes great photos.Great zoom,much better than most cameras,the overall performance is awsome!

Reviews.Content: SaludosEs realmente una camara excelente, excelentes funciones, sin embargo son tantas que aveces selecciono la equivocada y sale mal la foto; eso es lo unico que tiene que tomar en cuenta la persona que se decida por estos modelos, NO hacen todo el trabajo por nosotros.Es realmente comica la funcion del smile shotter, y estoy feliz con la calidad de la imagen y el video. Aparte que ahorre mucho dinero adquiriendo el producto a través de Amazon.Todos saben la calidad y los beneficios de tener una camara Sony Cybershot DSC-W... son realmentes unicas en su tipo.
